name: Pirate King
description:
Steal money from the king's treasure chest, sail through the Caribbean with your ship and meet pirates and wild animals.

With a few upgrades on your ship and in your home port, you can do it.

Become the King of the Pirates!

I wish you a lot of fun and look forward to your comments and if you like 'Pirate King' a positive rating.

Hint: Saves in browser games aren't really safe. So please use the 'export game data' function from time to time.  Most save problems occur because of the browser security settings. I use cookies.
So if they are disabled in your browser, save will not work!

Ad:  You can try 'Dark Idle' and 'Feed the bunny', my other games on  Itch.io too. 
They are very different but I like them both very much.
